abstracts.cdata!:
The Petroleum Exploration Technical
            Assistance Project will help accelerate petroleum
            exploration in Kenya by assisting the Government to: (i)
            strengthen its technical capability to negotiate production
            sharing agreements and supervise petroleum exploration; (ii)
            establish the information necessary to identify and open up
            new prospective areas for exploration; and (iii) promote and
            offer prospective acreage to interested oil companies and
            subsequently negotiate contracts and monitor the
            company's activities. These objectives would be
            accomplished through technical assistance, training,
            purchase of equipment, and geophysical data gathering.
